mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_intro FROM course_teacher_table t, course_table c WHERE t.teacher_id = #{id} AND t.course_id = c.course_id
SELECT * FROM course_table WHERE course_id NOT IN (SELECT course_id FROM course_teacher_table WHERE teacher_id = #{id})
SELECT question_id, course_name, question_rate, question_mark, question_type, question_body FROM question_table q, course_table c WHERE teacher_id = #{id} AND q.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT e.exam_id, c.course_name, e.exam_time_start, e.exam_time_end, e.exam_length FROM exam_table e, course_table c, course_teacher_table t, user_table u WHERE t.teacher_id = #{id} AND e.course_id = t.course_id = c.course_id AND t.teacher_id = u.user_id

SELECT t.teacher_id, u.user_name teacher_name, t.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_intro FROM course_student_table s, course_teacher_table t, course_table c, user_table u WHERE s.student_id = #{id} AND s.crs_tch_id = t.pri_id AND t.teacher_id = u.user_id AND t.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT t.teacher_id, u.user_name teacher_name, t.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_intro FROM course_teacher_table t, course_table c, user_table u WHERE t.course_id NOT IN (SELECT t.course_id FROM course_student_table s, course_teacher_table t WHERE s.student_id = #{id} AND s.crs_tch_id = t.pri_id) AND t.teacher_id = u.user_id AND t.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT e.exam_id, c.course_name, e.exam_length, h.start_time AS exam_time_start, h.end_time AS exam_time_end FROM course_student_table s, course_teacher_table t, exam_table e, course_table c, exam_history_table h WHERE s.student_id = #{id} AND h.student_id = #{id} AND s.crs_tch_id = t.pri_id AND t.course_id = e.course_id = c.course_id AND h.exam_id = e.exam_id UNION SELECT e.exam_id, c.course_name, e.exam_length, e.exam_time_start AS exam_time_start, e.exam_time_end AS exam_time_end FROM course_student_table s, course_teacher_table t, exam_table e, course_table c WHERE s.student_id = #{id} AND s.crs_tch_id = t.pri_id AND t.course_id = e.course_id = c.course_id AND e.exam_id NOT IN (SELECT exam_id FROM exam_history_table WHERE student_id = #{id})

SELECT h.exam_id, c.course_name, h.mult_score, h.subj_score FROM exam_history_table h, exam_table e, course_table c WHERE h.student_id = #{id} AND h.exam_id = e.exam_id AND e.course_id = c.course_id AND h.is_reviewed = 'true'
